summary:
Adds 87 new mounts near Whiterun

Ajoute 87 nouvelles montures au Sud de Blancherive

11 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 2.7.1 ( Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) is Required)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][b] Version 2.6.6[/b][/color] and [color=#00ff00][b] Version 2.7.1[/b][/color] (SKSE version). No DLC required.

[color=#00ff00]Optional Files: .Esp Version Française [/color]


[color=#00ff00][b]11 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 2.7.1[/b][/color] ([url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) [/url] is Required)
[i] Green Atronach, Magic Anomaly, Flame, Stormy, Paalaz, Pazuzu, Spectrum, Fire, Mjöllnir, Azraël, Nerthus[/i]

[color=#ff0000] [b][size=4]LOCATION OF THE MOUNTS[/size][/b] [/color] Whiterun Stables (Ecuries de Blancherive) and around the Pelagia Farm (Ferme de Pelagia), the Chillfurrow Farm (Ferme de Sillonfrais) and the Honningbrew Meader (Hydromellerie d’Hydronning)

You can also download two "Add-ons" to this mod :[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25511 ]MONSTER MOUNTS Dawnguard[/url] (Requires Dawnguard !)
and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31538]MONSTER MOUNTS Dragonborn[/url] (Requires Dragonborn !)

[img]https://i.imgur.com/9BQaJHt.gif[/img]

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18012107050416616015484324.jpg][img]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/21//18012107050416616015484324.jpg[/img][/url]

This mod adds to the South of Whiterun the following mounts (all "essential") available straight away:

1)[color=#f4a460] [b] Giant Mudcrab[/b][/color] (Vasard)
2)[color=#f4a460] [b] Chaurus[/b][/color]
3)[color=#f4a460] [b] Falmers[/b][/color] (4)
4)[color=#f4a460] [b] Giant Frostbitespider [/b][/color] (Givrépeires) (2)
5)[color=#f4a460] [b] Giant [/b][/color](Géant)[color=#00ff00][i] You have to take out your weapon then left click on the mouse to move forward faster[/i] [/color]
6)[color=#f4a460] [b] Hagraven [/b][/color] (Harfreuse)
7)[color=#f4a460] [b] Slaughterfish [/b][/color] (Poisson carnassier)[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hUmBg-jMsAU ] Rideable Slaughterfish[/url]
8)[color=#f4a460] [b] Trolls[/b][/color] (2)
9)[color=#f4a460] [b] Werewolfbeast [/b][/color](Loup-garou)
10)[color=#f4a460] [b] Dwarvensteamcenturion [/b][/color] (Centurion Dwemer)
11)[color=#f4a460] [b] Dwarvenspherecenturion [/b][/color] ( Sphère Dwemer)
12)[color=#f4a460] [b] DwarvenSpider [/b][/color] (Araignée Dwemer)
13)[color=#f4a460] [b] AtronachFrost [/b][/color] (Atronach de glace)
14)[color=#f4a460] [b] AtronachFlame [/b][/color] (Atronach de feu)
15)[color=#f4a460] [b] Spriggans[/b][/color] (2)
16)[color=#f4a460] [b] Skeleton [/b][/color] (Squelette)
17)[color=#f4a460] [b] Draugrs[/b][/color](3)
18)[color=#f4a460] [b] Wispmother [/b][/color] (Lucereine) [color=#00ff00] If your mount disappears(with impossibility to dismount): Zoom out with the scroll Wheel or FAST TRAVEL[/color]
19)[color=#f4a460] [b] Witchlight [/b][/color] (Feu follet)
20)[color=#f4a460] [b] AtronachStorm [/b][/color] (Atronach de Foudre)
21)[color=#f4a460] [b] Giant Skeever [/b][/color] (2) (Ragnards)
22)[color=#f4a460] [b] Giant Fox [/b][/color] (2) (Renards géants)
23)[color=#f4a460] [b] Giant Dog [/b][/color] (Chien géant)
24)[color=#f4a460] [b] Giant Cow [/b][/color] (2) (Vaches géantes)
25)[color=#f4a460] [b] Goat [/b][/color] (Chèvre géante)
26)[color=#f4a460] [b] Ponies [/b][/color] (3) (Poneys)
27)[color=#f4a460] [b] Mammoth [/b][/color] (2) (Mammouths)
28)[color=#f4a460] [b] Moose [/b][/color] (Elan)
29)[color=#f4a460] [b] WhiteStag [/b][/color] (Cerf Blanc)
30)[color=#f4a460] [b] Wolf [/b][/color] (4) (Loups)
31)[color=#f4a460] [b] Horker [/b][/color] (Horqueur)
32)[color=#f4a460] [b] Bears [/b][/color] (3) (Ours)
33)[color=#f4a460] [b] Giant Chicken [/b][/color](Gros Poulet) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9XlGWweWeo4&feature=plcp ]Riding a Chicken[/url]
34)[color=#f4a460] [b] Giant Rabbit [/b][/color] (Gros Lapin)
35)[color=#f4a460] [b] IceWraith [/b][/color] (Spectre de Glace) [color=#00ff00] If your mount disappears(with impossibility to dismount):Zoom out with the scroll Wheel or FAST TRAVEL [/color]
36)[color=#f4a460] [b] Sabrecat Tiger [/b][/color] (Tigre)

Thanks to muppetpuppet for the Sabrecat Tiger in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10473]Tiger retexture and skin addon for sabrecat race[/url] (“enjoy free to use”)

37)[color=#f4a460] [b] DragonPriest [/b][/color] (Prêtre-Dragon)
38)[color=#f4a460] [b] Sabrecat Leopard [/b][/color] (Léopard)

Thanks to AlienSlof for the Sabrecat Leopard in his mod [url=http://www.ladymoiraine.com/forum/index.php?topic=3842.0 ]Slofs Sabrecats[/url] (“Use these textures freely”)

39)[color=#f4a460] [b] Lion[/b][/color]
40)[color=#f4a460] [b] Lioness[/b] [/color] (Lionne)
41)[color=#f4a460] [b] Sabrecat Panther[/b][/color] (Panthère Noire)

Thanks to FrankTheFish for the meshes/textures of lion/lioness/sabrecat panther (“Yes you may use my Lions and other big cats as long as proper credit is given”) in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12647 ]Prides of Skyrim[/url] by Frankthefish

42)[color=#f4a460] [b] Dragonfire [/b][/color] (Dragon de Feu)
43)[color=#f4a460] [b] Guar[/b] [/color]

Thanks to mdogger » for the mesh/textures of the guar

44)[color=#f4a460] [b] Wild Cat[/b][/color]
45)[color=#f4a460] [b] Wild Boar [/b][/color]

Thanks to GSC Gameworld for the meshes/textures of Wild Cat and Wild Boar

46)[color=#f4a460] [b] Triceratops [/b][/color]

Thanks to Mr. Siika for the original mesh and Ghogiel for the original texture
Thanks to StarX for the replacement mesh and textures (“yes, you can use them.”)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19115 ]Skyrim Monster Mod Tritop Replacer [/url]by "StarX"

47)[color=#f4a460] [b] Hyena[/b][/color]
48)[color=#f4a460] [b] Therium[/b][/color]
49)[color=#f4a460] [b] Raptor [/b][/color]

Thanks to muppetpuppet for the Hyena,Therium, Raptor, textures and meshes (“yes use everything you want”)
The meshes/textures 43) to 49) can be found in the mod [color=#ff8c00] Skyrim Monster Mod[/color] (Thanks to Dogtown1)

50)[color=#f4a460][b] Death Angel (Reaper Spirit)[/b][/color] (« Wisp race ») [color=#00ff00] If your mount disappears(with impossibility to dismount): Zoom out with the scroll Wheel or FAST TRAVEL [/color]
51)[color=#f4a460][b] Vampire Lich [/b][/color](« dragon priest race »)
52)[color=#f4a460][b] Roach[/b][/color] (« Frostbitespider race »)
53)[color=#f4a460][b] Shark [/b][/color](« slaughterfish race »)

Thanks to Dogtown1 for the meshes/textures of these 4 créatures (50 to 53) in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35631/]Skyrim Monster Mod[/url] (smm) by "Dogtown1"

54)[color=#f4a460] [b] "Kong" [/b][/color] (imga)
55)[color=#f4a460] [b] Sload [/b][/color]
56)[color=#f4a460] [b] River Crab[/b][/color]
57)[color=#f4a460] [b] Forest Spider[/b][/color]

Thanks to muppetpuppet" for the ”Kong” (imga), “River Crab”, "Forest Spider" et “Sload” textures and meshes in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9782 ] Moonpath to Elsweyr (Nexus) [/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10738 ]Moonpath to Elsweyr (Workshop) [/url]

58)[color=#f4a460] [b] Cats [/b][/color] (Chats) (4)
59)[color=#f4a460] [b] Dogs [/b][/color] (Chiens) (2)

These cats/dogs can be found in the mod [color=#ff8c00] Pets of Skyrim[/color] Thanks to Qasiermo and Hissssa for the meshes/textures ("He is impossible to get in touch with atm, but his readme says its is a modders resource. So give him all credits")
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17424]Pets of Skyrim [/url]
[url=http://hissssa.cocolog-nifty.com/blog/ ]Hissssa blog [/url]

60)[color=#f4a460] [b] Fire Icewraith[/b][/color]
61)[color=#f4a460] [b] Magic Anomaly[/b][/color]
62)[color=#f4a460] [b] Green Atronach[/b][/color]
63)[color=#f4a460] [b] Spectral Dog[/b][/color]
64)[color=#f4a460] [b] Spectral Draugr[/b][/color]


->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]4M6hnS-sGro[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[color=#ff0000] [b] [size=4]Controls with the Fully Flyable Mounts[/size] [/b] [/color] ONLY for the [color=#00ff00][b]version 2.7.1 [/b][/color]([url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) [/url] is Required)


[color=#ff0000]UP[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Shift[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Ctrl[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN to the ground quickly[/color]: [color=#00ff00] E or Space[/color]

[color=#00ff00] W[/color] (or Z): [color=#ff0000]forward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] S[/color]: [color=#ff0000]backward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] A[/color] (or Q): [color=#ff0000]turn left[/color]

[color=#00ff00] D[/color]: [color=#ff0000]turn right[/color]


When flying press [color=#ff0000]F12 [/color] to reconfigure the Keys (...a little problem: it is the default screenshot button on Steam ! You can go into Steam and disabled screenshots)

If there is a problem with the F12 key, uncheck the mod, make a backup and then check again the mod


[i] You only have to be careful to not crash into the ground (apparently they can also burrow underground) !

(With my setup !) I often need to restart the game a second time, in order to fly (problem with SKSE ?)[/i]


Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]NoxyGame[/color] and [color=#ff8c00]DOSMaster[/color] for the script of the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29860/? ] Pegasus MLP fully flyable [/url] “feel free to use/enhance the script/nif/mod, but give credits to the authors”


[color=#ff0000] Video [/color] with Monster Mounts + [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25511 ]MONSTER MOUNTS Dawnguard[/url]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]T7IHXLyp-64[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-


[color=#ff0000] [b][size=4]IMPORTANT[/size] [/b][/color]

1) You must place the .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to avoid getting the bugs or problems with some mounts ...

But if you have my other mods (Monster Mounts Dawnguard / Monster Mounts Dragonborn / Summon Big Cats/ Summon Werewolf and Co./ Summon Giants, etc...) you must choose the one OR the other one ! IT’S ONLY THE LAST .ESP WHO HAS THE BUGS FIXED

2) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following) :


[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not.

->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]Jocd0wrsyNA[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[color=#ff0000] [b][size=4]INSTALLATION and UNINSTALLATION[/size] [/b][/color]

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) With « 7 – zip » -or other- (right click) you must unzip the downloaded file: “Monster Mounts 2-6-6 ” or "Monster Mounts 2-7-1"

2) You have a folder: “Data” (with 2 files: “Montures Monstres.bsa” and “Montures Monstres.esp”)

You have to put this folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

3) When you start the game, in "data files", you must check "Montures Monstres.esp" at the bottom of the list.....OK.....play

To uninstall, simply remove these files ! (if you have forgotten which files these are, simply unzip the folder of the mod again, and then find the same in Data).




[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]BUGS or PROBLEMS[/size][/b] [/color]

You have to take out your weapon then left click on the mouse to move forward faster with the Giant

DO NOT GO DOWN (E key) when you are running fast (4 legs) with the Werewolf, the Guar and the Raptor....A solution: mount again and QUICKLY TYPE THE KEYS Z (W ?), E and ALT

If you dismount in the water with the Chicken or the Bunny, it is possible to swim in the air !! Solution: MOUNT AGAIN or SPACEBAR

When you get off Drago you can get stuck between his wing and torso


If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...



In French (Début et de 2'27'' à 11'55''):

->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]9JZvV-aM5jg[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-


With my mods, you have other Fully Flyable Mounts!

7 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 1.5.1 of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25511/?] Monster Mounts Dawnguard [/url]:
Chaurus Hunter, Chaurus Hunter Fledgling, Soul Wisp, Death Wing, Red Naga, Swamp Naga, Skeleton Mistman

9 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 2.6 of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31538/?] Monster Mounts Dragonborn [/url]:
Bone Storm, Ash Guardian, Aazidal, Dukaan, Seeker, Netch, Flying Shoggoth, Spectral Dragon, Flying Scrib

6 Fully Flyable Mounts (Blood/Reptilian/Pebbled/Swamp/Peat Bog Chaurus Hunters + Flying Scrib) in
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59433/?]Fully Flying Chaurus Hunters[/url]

And 58 Dragons in my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61101/?] Fully Flying Dragons [/url]
author: gg77

files.name: Monster Mounts 2-7-1 SKSE version
files.changelogHtml:
New in the version 2.7.1: Cleaned with TesVEdit

New in the version 2.7: 11 Fully Flyable Mounts -Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) is Required-
(Green Atronach, Magic Anomaly, Flame, Stormy, Paalaz, Pazuzu, Spectrum, Fire, Mjöllnir, Azraël, Nerthus)

[Version 2.6.5] 15 names changed + Reduction of the size for some textures in the BSA version -only- (for less CTD with a few configurations)

[Version 2.6.4] A bug with the magic anomaly fixed

[Version 2.6.3] Some bugs fixed with the Cats, the Big Cats ( Adds Sabrecat Idle Animation Fix by testiger2 ) and the Foxes

[Version 2.6.1] Bug with my other mod ( Armored Daedroth - Werewolf Replacer ) fixed

[Version 2.6] Some bugs (or problems) fixed ( You must place the. esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to avoid getting the bugs)

files.name: Esp Version Francaise pour la version 2.7.1 SKSE
